subject: Re: [LH] "She's Leaving Home"
body:
On 5/20/07, Donny Bravo  wrote:
>
> Speaking of covers, now that she's done Pi, she should do a cover of
> this song:
>
> http://youtube.com/watch?v=L9HaNbsIfp0

Considering her propensity to be a control-freak, I fear she would
very likely toe the MPAA line on this issue.  Of course, she's one of
very few people to draft an artist-friendly contract with the SOBs.

Anyone have any citations where she's actually commented on DMCA, etc.?

-- 
pDaleC
"Gotta kick at the darkness, till it bleeds daylight."
